attributes.action: Allow marches for "Hetrosexual Pride" in England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that hetrosexual people are under represented when it come to showing pride in their sexuality.
I would like to see an annual march in a major city like Manchester on the lines of the "Gay Pride" marches currently held each year.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
